spec_data.Name: perl-Module-Build-SDL
spec_data.Description:
Module::Build::SDL is a subclass of Module::Build created to make easy
some tasks specific to SDL applications - e.g. packaging SDL
application/game into PAR archive.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 02:46:54 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Module::Build subclass for building SDL applications
